text: Farinelli (; 24 January 1705 – 16 September 1782) was the stage name of Carlo Maria Michelangelo Nicola Broschi (). He was a castrato singer. == Other websites == * * Carlos Broschi (sp) by Eugène Scribe * * Farinelli Study Centre * Castrato superstar disinterred (Retrieved 8 May 2008) * Castration Affected Skeleton Of Famous Opera Singer Farinelli, Archaeologists Say Category:1705 births Category:1782 deaths Category:Italian opera singers
title: Farinelli
